body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities               Outdoor Activities       Explore the hiking trails through the prairie and woodland. Embark on the quilt discovery experience. Dial into cell phone audio tours. Discover the EarthCache program.       Explore the peaceful landscape and hidden wonders at Homestead National Monument of America. NPS photo by Molly Watters
title: Homestead National Monument of America: Outdoor Activities
